arts.ttl: García shines in Espanyol goal and Valencia hits the bottom of La Liga
arts.sum: Espanyol was grateful again that Joan García didn’t end up at Arsenal last summer after the goalkeeper made multiple saves against Leganes to salvage a 1-1 draw in La Liga on Saturday. Valencia had been eyeing its first away win of the season after Luis Rioja scored on the break with half an hour left.
